backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining gift pack store data types (GiftItem, GiftPack, Cart, Order, UserProfile) and storage maps, with initialization function to populate dummy gift packs and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module providing a no-op run function for future data migration support.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: automatic cart sync on Internet Identity login and complete cart clearing on logout, both with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components, pages, and hooks describing cart synchronization, authentication flows, product display, customization, and checkout functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme color schemes using oklch color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the Gift Pack Store application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup, theme provider, automatic data initialization, and login/logout detection that syncs cart from backend on login and clears cart completely on logout.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartItemRow: Cart item row component displaying gift pack details with quantity controls, custom message, wrapping option, remove button, and loading states using backend data fetching.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartSummary: Cart summary card component calculating subtotal, GST tax, and total from gift pack data with proceed to checkout button and loading skeleton states.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Address: Form component for collecting delivery address details with validation for Indian addresses, including name, phone, street, city, state, and pincode fields. Pre-fills form with user profile data if available.
frontend/src/components/checkout/OrderSu: Displays order summary card showing cart items, subtotal, GST (18%), and total price with Indian rupee formatting. Uses cart and gift packs hooks to calculate totals.
frontend/src/components/customization/Ba: Grid of selectable basket type cards (Wicker Basket, Wooden Crate, Gift Box) with icons and descriptions. Highlights selected basket type with terracotta ring.
frontend/src/components/customization/It: Grid component for selecting gift items up to a maximum limit (default 12), displaying mock items with prices, descriptions, and categories. Shows selection count alert and disables items when limit is reached.
frontend/src/components/customization/Me: Textarea form for adding an optional personalized message (max 200 characters) to the gift. Displays remaining character count.
frontend/src/components/customization/Pa: Grid of selectable packing style cards (Classic Wrap, Premium Wrap, Gold Ribbon, Silver Ribbon) with color-coded backgrounds. Highlights selected packing type with terracotta ring.
Sticky sidebar preview card showing selected basket type, size, items list with remove buttons, packing style, message preview, and calculated total price. Displays item count and pricing breakdown.
frontend/src/components/customization/Si: Grid of three size option cards (Small, Medium, Large) showing capacity, description, and additional price. Highlights selected size with terracotta ring and badge.
frontend/src/components/customization/St: Horizontal progress indicator showing 5 customization steps (Basket Type, Size, Products, Packing, Message) with numbered circles, checkmarks for completed steps, and connecting lines.
Navigation component with Back and Next buttons for multi-step flows, disabling Back on step 1 and Next when canProceed is false.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component displaying company info, quick links, delivery details, social media icons, copyright notice, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Sticky header with logo, navigation menu, search/cart/profile buttons, cart item count badge, and Internet Identity login/logout functionality with mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: Root layout component that wraps pages with Header, main content area (Outlet), and Footer in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/product/FilterSi: Sidebar filter component for catalog with category checkboxes and price range slider, displayed as a card on desktop and sheet on mobile.
frontend/src/components/product/GiftPack: Gift pack card component displaying image, title, category badge, description, price, and add-to-cart button with hover effects and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductG: Grid layout component that renders GiftPackCard components in a responsive grid or shows an empty state when no packs are found.
frontend/src/components/profile/OrderHis: Expandable order card displaying order ID, date, status badge, total amount, and collapsible item details with delivery address.
Order history section that fetches and displays sorted orders using OrderHistoryCard components, with loading skeletons and empty state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Provides cart state management with localStorage persistence, BigInt serialization for quantities, and methods to add/update/remove items, sync with backend, and calculate totals.
frontend/src/hooks/useGiftPacks.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching all gift packs, filtered gift packs by criteria, and individual gift packs by ID from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout, managing identity state, and configuring AuthClient with delegation options.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrder.ts: Exports a mutation hook for creating orders with cart items, delivery address, and customization options via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderHistory.ts: Provides a React Query hook to fetch the authenticated user's order history from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a mutation hook to initialize backend data and invalidate the gift packs cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and update user profile data (name, email, phone, address) with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color palette (terracotta, sage, cream) using OKLCH color space for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays shopping cart with item rows and summary, showing empty state with navigation options when cart is empty, and listening for cart update events.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Renders the gift pack catalog with search bar, filter sidebar, and product grid, showing loading skeletons while fetching filtered results.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page that validates user authentication, displays cart items with totals, collects delivery address via AddressForm, and creates orders using the useCreateOrder hook before navigating to order confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/CustomPackPage.tsx: Multi-step custom gift pack builder page with 5 steps (basket type, size, products, packing type, message card) that validates each step and adds the configured custom pack to cart.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature highlights (curated collections, personalization, delivery), and featured gift packs display using the useGiftPacks hook.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Order confirmation page that displays order ID, estimated delivery date (7 days), and navigation buttons to continue shopping or browse more gifts.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile management page with form for personal details and delivery address (including Indian states dropdown), plus an OrderHistorySection component; requires authentication.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validation utility functions for Indian pincode (6 digits), phone number (10 digits), and delivery availability checking.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color palette (terracotta, sage, cream), typography plugin, container queries, animations, and extended theme tokens for the gift pack application.
project_state.json: Project state tracking cart synchronization features: fetching cart on Internet Identity login and clearing cart on logout. Contains two existing features and two pending feature requests related to cart state management.
